description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

description.en:
I wanted to design!

A dream I have had since I was 12 years old and have nurtured since then. For thirty years I worked hard, not missing a single day, but the reality is that I'm a construction site manager constructing buildings for other people. If I hadn't made that choice back then... Would I have become an architectural designer? Thirty years after all that, a miracle happened to me.

I went back to my university school days 20 years ago, in 2010.
I'm 22 years old, but with 20 years of field experience, I'm going fulfil my dream of being an architectural designer and make world famous designs of my own!

Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

title.en: All Four Seasons of the Keyaki Sisters

altTitles.en: All four seasons of the Keyaki sisters.

description.en: Follows the daily life of the 4 Keyaki sisters. Mutsumi, the oldest sister, is an excellent cook and has a loud voice. The second oldest, Akemi, is a beauty who likes to read books. The third, Izumi, is a cheerful and straightfoward sporty girl. Hitomi, the youngest sister, is a tidy and graceful girl who is good at knitting.

title.en: Kirby of the Stars - Ultra Super Pupupu Hero: Here Comes the Pupupu Land Hero!

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ ウルトラスーパープププヒーロー　プププランドのヒーロー現る!!編

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoshi no Kirby - Ultra Super Pupupu Hero

description.en:
Kirby of *Pupupu Hero* appears as Ultra Super!

In the ridiculously peaceful land of Pupupu Land, Dark Meta Knight, who looks just like Meta Knight but is super sinister, appears!
Dark Meta Knight's sword, which has been doing evil again and again, has turned Kirby into four!
The four food-crazed Kirbys have caused a food crisis in Pupupu Land, and it has become super-sinister?!

First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

description.en:
This is Masashi Kishimoto's manga, Karakuri. It was created before Naruto and was collected in Naruto: The Official Premium Fanbook.  
In order to combat a deadly virus, an implant was made that is transplanted into a human being's nervous system. Unfortunately, this implant technology was also used by the less scrupulous to create human weapons, blood-red eyed creatures referred to as "Roido". To cope with this threat the defense agency has created the Karakuri unit, an elite unit whose human members are monitored by small talking animals. As Kiru the karakuri goes to visit his friends Koten and Koron while on leave, he's going to learn that there are no days off against the Roido!

When Hana replaces her sister at an omiai (like a goukon, but for marriage) little does she expect to be insulted and called a gold digger by the handsome and older Takane! Furious, she throws her wig in his face and leaves. Unexpectedly she gets asked out on a date by Takane the next day. How will these two ever find love?
description.pl: Kiedy Hana zastąpiła swoją siostrę na spotkaniu aranżującym małżeństwo, nie przypuszczała, że zostanie nazwana deską i całkiem zwyczajną dziewczyną przez przystojnego i starszego Takane! W złości rzuca w niego swoją perukę. Następnego dnia zostaje niespodziewanie zaproszona na randkę przez Takane. Czy ta dwójka kiedykolwiek znajdzie miłość?

description.en:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!

title.en: Fire Emblem - Genealogy of the Holy War - GEKKA GINYU (OOSAWA Mitsuki)

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム聖戦の系譜画集―月下吟遊

altTitles.en: Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War Art Book - Gekka Ginyu

description.en: This is an art book featuring full color illustrations and sketches from Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War (OOSAWA Mitsuki). It was published as part of the manga written and illustrated by Mitsuki Oosawa and features a short story following Sigurd, Quan, and Eldigan during their youth at Belhalla Academy.

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวแห่งทางสายไหม

description.ar: تدور أحداث القصة في بلدة ريفية بالقرب من بحر قزوين في آسيا الوسطى خلال أواخر القرن التاسع عشر عند الغزو الروسي ، وتدور القصة حول امرأة شابة ، أمير ، تصل من قرية بعيدة عبر الجبال لتتزوج كارلوك ، شاب ثماني سنوات. صغارها. يتتبع المسلسل علاقتهما أثناء تطورها ، بينما يقدم قصصًا أخرى حول مختلف الشابات وحياتهن اليومية مع خطيبهن وأزواجهن على طول طريق الحرير .
description.de: Die zwanzigjährige Amira wird von ihrem Clan zu einer Familie jenseits der Berge geschickt, damit sie deren zwölfjährigen Sohn Karluk heiratet. Nach der Hochzeit fügt sich Amira schnell in ihre neue Familie ein. Während sie einige Zeit nach ihrer Hochzeit mit Karluk entfernte Verwandte seines Clans besucht, beschließt ihre eigene Familie, sie zurückzufordern, da sie mit Amira andere Pläne haben...
description.en:
Central Asia, mid-19th century: in a rural town near the Caspian Sea, a young woman named Amir arrives from a distant village across the mountains to marry Karluk, a boy eight years her junior. The story unfolds among details of everyday family and community life. However, the peaceful atmosphere is disturbed when Amir's family demands to take her back to their village.

---
- **Won the 7th Manga Taisho Award in 2014**
description.es: Ambientada en una ciudad rural cerca del mar Caspio en Asia Central a finales del siglo xix, la historia gira en torno a una joven llamada Amira, que llega de un pueblo distante a través de las montañas para casarse con Karluk, un joven ocho años menor que ella. La serie sigue su relación a medida que se desarrolla, al tiempo que presenta otras historias sobre varias mujeres jóvenes y su vida cotidiana con sus respectivos novios y esposos a lo largo de la Ruta de la Seda.
description.fi: Tarina seuraa aluksi tuoreen morsiamen, Amiran, sekä hänen uuden perheensä elämää. Myöhemmin muun muassa kuljetaan tutkimusmatkailijan seurassa ja tutustutaan uusiin seutuihin ja uusiin morsiamiin. Upea piirrosjälki, taidokas tunnelmanluonti, uskottavasti rakennettu eksoottinen miljöö sekä useat kiinnostavat henkilöhahmot tekevät Aron morsiamista vuoden mangatapauksen!
description.fr:
La vie d’Amir, 20 ans, est bouleversée le jour où elle est envoyée dans le clan voisin pour y être mariée. Elle y rencontre Karluk, son futur époux… un garçon de huit ans son cadet ! Autre village, autres mœurs… La jeune fille, chasseuse accomplie, découvre une existence différente, entre l’aïeule acariâtre, une ribambelle d’enfants et Smith, l’explorateur anglais venu étudier leurs traditions.

Mais avant même que le jeune couple ait eu le temps de se faire à sa nouvelle vie, le couperet tombe : pour conclure une alliance plus avantageuse avec un puissant voisin, le clan d’Amir décide de récupérer la jeune femme coûte que coûte…
description.id:
Karluk Eyhon dan Amira Hargal adalah pasangan suami istri dengan usia terpaut delapan tahun (Amira 20 tahun dan Karluk 12 tahun). Setelah menikah mereka tinggal bersama dengan Keluarga Karluk.
Hubungan keduanya pun berjalan dengan baik. Namun, ketenangan mereka kemudian terusik oleh kedatangan kakak serta sepupu Amira yang berniat membawanya pulang. Apa yang sebenarnya terjadi!?
description.it: Tardo XIX secolo, nelle vicinanze del Mar Caspio in Asia centrale, lungo la via della seta. La ventenne Amira viene mandata dalle montagne in cui vive ad un altro villaggio, per sposare il più giovane Karluk, appena dodicenne. Dopo gli iniziali imbarazzi per la differenza di età fra i due, il loro rapporto comincia ad essere sempre più unito e Amira inizia ad abituarsi alla vita della tribù e ad integrarsi nella comunità, ma la pace viene disturbata quando delle persone della famiglia di Amira raggiungono il villaggio per riprenderla con loro.
description.ja: 美貌の娘・アミル（20歳）が嫁いだ相手は、若干12歳の少年・カルルク。遊牧民と定住民、８歳の年の差を越えて、ふたりは結ばれるのか……？　『エマ』で19世紀末の英国を活写した森薫の最新作はシルクロードの生活文化。馬の背に乗り弓を構え、悠久の大地に生きるキャラクターたちの物語！
description.ko:
독특한 감성으로 큰 인기를 끌며 많은 사랑을 받았던 만화 <엠마>의 작가 모리카오루의 신작. 19세기 중앙아시아의 실크로드를 배경으로 한 장대한 스케일의 내용과 섬세하고 화려한 그림 그리고 한층 성숙된 탄탄한 스토리로 무장하였다. 드넓은 중앙 아시아를 배경으로 이야기가 펼쳐진다.

이제 무대는 중앙아시아 실크로드. 끝없는 대지에서 살아가는 유목 정착민의 낮과 밤이 펼쳐지는 카스피 해 인근의 지방도시. 아름다운 연상의 신부 아미루와 소년에서 어른이 되어가는 어린 신랑 카르르크는 부부가 된다. 다른 부족에서 시집온 아미루와 어린 신랑 카르르크의 평화롭고 행복한 시간도 잠시. 이 두 부부에게 다가오는 어두운 계획이 꿈틀거리기 시작한다.
description.ne:
मध्य एशिया, 19 औं शताब्दीको मध्य: 
क्यास्पियन सागर नजिकैको एक ग्रामीण सहरमा, आमिरा नामकी युवती आफू भन्दा आठ वर्ष कान्छो केटा कार्लुकसँग विवाह गर्न पहाड पारी टाढाको गाउँबाट आइपुग्छिन्।  
कथा दैनिक परिवार र सामुदायिक जीवनको विवरणहरूको बारेमा हो।
तर, आमिराको परिवारले उनलाई आफ्नो गाउँ फर्काउन माग गर्दा शान्तिपूर्ण वातावरण खलबलिएको छ।
description.pl: Dwudziestoletnia Amir zostaje wydana za młodszego o 8 lat Karluka. Dziewczyna opuszcza swoje koczownicze plemię, by zamieszkać wraz z mężem i jego rodziną w odległym mieście na Jedwabnym Szlaku. Uzdolniona w łucznictwie i jeździectwie, otwarta i bezpośrednia Amir próbuje odnaleźć swoje miejsce w nowej społeczności. Gdy między nią a Karlukiem rozkwita głębsze uczucie, w mieście pojawia się starszy brat Amir, żądając unieważnienia małżeństwa. Między dwoma rodzinami wybucha spór.
description.ru: Это истории из жизни Амиры - прекрасной лучницы и наездницы, посланной за горы, чтобы выйти замуж за Карлука - одного из поселенцев, который младше её на 8 лет. Благодаря многим своим умениям, Амира быстро находит себе место среди жителей деревни. Но всё меняется, когда люди из деревни Амиры решают забрать её назад.
description.th: ตั้งอยู่ในเมืองชนบทใกล้ทะเลแคสเปียนในเอเชียกลางในช่วงปลายศตวรรษที่ 19 ที่รัสเซียพิชิตเรื่องราวหมุนรอบหญิงสาวคนหนึ่งชื่ออาเมียร์ที่มาจากหมู่บ้านห่างไกลข้ามภูเขาเพื่อแต่งงานกับคาร์ลุก ชายหนุ่มอายุแปดขวบ จูเนียร์ของเธอ ชุดนี้ความสัมพันธ์ของพวกเขาในขณะที่มันพัฒนาในขณะที่การนำตุ๊กตุ่นอื่น ๆ เกี่ยวกับหญิงสาวที่ต่างๆและชีวิตประจำวันของพวกเขากับคู่หมั้นของตนและสามีไปตามเส้นทางสายไหม
description.uk: Події цієї романтично-пригодницької історії розгортаються у Середній Азії позаминулого століття. Молода дівчина Аміра із суворого кочового клану прибуває до селища, щоб вийти заміж за Карлука. Це незвичайний шлюб – адже наречений молодший за неї на вісім років. Однак найбільше бажання Аміри – стати йому гарною дружиною. Вона усіма силами старається догодити і йому, і своїй новій родині, дивуючи давно осілих землеробів своїми талантами.
description.vi:
Vào thế kỉ 19, ở khu vực Trung Á, tại một vùng thị tứ gần biển Caspi…

Có một cô dâu đã vượt qua bao núi đồi để đến bên một “chú rể nhỏ”.
Cô hoang dã, đáng yêu, chân thành, đáng quý.
Vút qua thảo nguyên xanh ngời, cô bên “chàng” cưỡi ngựa du ca.
Giương cung hướng lên trời, cô đem về biết bao ngạc nhiên, kì lạ.

Đây là câu chuyện về một phương trời xa xôi huyền bí.
Câu chuyện trên Con đường Tơ lụa lắm diệu kì.
Nơi cuộc sống diễn ra trong bao la, hào sảng.
Trong những hành trình, trong tình người và trong những lời ca.

Cùng với đó, không thể không nhắc đến nét vẽ tài hoa, tỉ mỉ đến tuyệt vời của tác giả, sẽ khắc họa những nét văn hóa quyến rũ đến lạ kì của một vùng Trung Á bát ngát, bao la.
description.zh-hk: 故事設定在19世紀後半，中亞與裏海週邊的草原地帶。以12岁的少年哈剌鲁和比他大8岁的新娘爱米尔为起頭，描写在丝绸之路的游牧民族和定居民族的生活。 由數個新娘的故事組成，新娘年齡不一，來自不同的地方。有各個角色的互動凸顯出當地的民俗風情。

description.en: Yilin bumps into the tomboy Rouxi, sparking an interest between each other that slowly blooms.
description.pt-br: Yilin esbarra na tomboy Rouxi, despertando um interesse entre elas que floresce lentamente.

title.en: The World of Otome Games Kindergarten is Tough for Mobs

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game Youchien wa Mobu ni Kibishii Youchiendesu

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲー幼稚園はモブに厳しい幼稚園です

altTitles.en: The World of Otome Games Kindergarten is Tough for Mobs

altTitles.id: Taman Kanak-Kanak Otome Game yang Keras terhadap Mob

description.en: Spin-off Comic from "The World of Otome Games is Tough for Mobs" Starts! A kindergartener mob life comedy! Even when they're tiny, they're still female chauvinists!
description.id: Komik Spin-off dari "Dunia Otome Games yang Keras terhadap Mob" Dimulai - Komedi Kehidupan Mob Bocah TK! Bahkan ketika mereka masih kecil, wanita masih punya kekuasaan besar daripada laki-laki!

description.en: Natsume Kiroemon, the protagonist, is the 45th leader of the Natsume family, and inherit the "Kiryuu no Mimi ", a tool which gives its bearer easy access to wealth and women. As a result of his father's death, he leaves the Italian monastery where he'd been training and rightfully takes the name "Natsume Kiroemon" as well as the power of the "Kiryuu no Mimi". Upon his return to Japan, he falls fatally in love with Kanako, one of the members of the rival Mina family. However, the evil hand of the Mina family attacks Natsume constantly and abductes Kanako. Now Natsume has unlocked the seal, making the Kiryuu's power surge, and he's striking back at the Mina family

A mysterious man named "Ryo" who has lost his memory wakes up in a different world populated by monster girls (fantasy species) that easily surpass the power of humans. He possesses a certain power, the skill of "charm", which forces him to increase the likability of all monster girls!
Despite his distress, Ryo uses his power to seduce all kinds of monster girls and build a harem. All in order to achieve a certain goal...!

Eros and carnage intersect in this otherworldly adventure tale that opens at!
description.ja:
人間の力を軽く凌駕するモンスター娘（幻想種）が跋扈する異世界で目覚めた、記憶を失った謎の男「リョウ」。そんな彼にはある力、モンスター娘たちすべての好感度を強制的に上げる「魅了」のスキルを所持していた!!
苦悩しつつもリョウは己の力を使いあらゆるモンスター娘を篭絡し、ハーレムを築く。すべてはある目的を遂行するため…!!!

**エロスと殺戮が交差する、エロティック異世界冒険譚 開幕――!!!!!!**
description.pt-br:
Um homem misterioso, conhecido como *"Ryou"*, que perdeu suas memórias, acorda em um mundo paralelo populado por mulheres monstro que possuem poderes que ultrapassam qualquer limite humano. No entanto, esse mesmo homem possui um poder, a habilidade conhecida como *"Charme"*, que lhe permite interferir na psique dessas *"criaturas fantásticas"*!
Apesar do contínuo sentimento de *"inquietação"*, Ryou usará sua habilidade para seduzir todo tipo de criatura fantástica, assim criando um harém, tudo para que seja possível alcançar um certo objetivo...

**Gore e erotismo se cruzam nesta aventura em um mundo paralelo!**

title.en: Sacchan to Ken-chan wa Kyou mo Itteru

altTitles.en: Sacchan and Ken-chan Are Going at it Again

altTitles.ja: さっちゃんとけんちゃんは今日もイってる

description.en: University student Kenta is excited to be going out with the quiet but beautiful Sachiko. Six months into their relationship, a side of Sachiko other than her "ladylike" side becomes apparent. The more you know about her, the more you fall in love with her.
description.ja: 物静かな美人・幸子と付き合うことになり、舞い上がる男子大学生・賢太。 付き合って半年後、明らかになる”おしとやか”だけじゃない彼女の一面に!? 知れば知るほど好きになる、イケメン彼女と乙女な彼氏のイってる系エロコメディ開幕!!

title.ja: A Banished Sage’s Progress to Discovering the World: The Story of What Happened When I Freed Myself from My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: 追放の賢者、世界を知る ～幼馴染勇者の圧力から逃げて自由になった俺～

altTitles.en: A Banished Sage Experiencing the World ~ I Escaped from the Pressure of My Childhood Friend Who Is a Hero and Became Free~
A Banished Sage's Progress to Discovering the World: The Story of What Happened When I Freed Myself from My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou no Kenja, Sekai wo Shiru ~Osanajimi Yuusha no Atsuryoku kara Nigete Jiyuu ni Natta Ore~

description.en: The wizard Haru spent his days being abused by the hero, his childhood friend Leticia, when one day while being scolded he thought to himself, "This is no good". And thus began Haru's adventure to regain his true self! The curtain unveils on an other world "redo" fantasy life!

A Catholic school where everything seems tranquil and fine. But for Ayeon, a day doesn't pass without getting bullied until one day, Yeonhwa steps in against the bullies. Ayeon is grateful for Yeonhwa but what she doesn't realize is that there seems to be something more than just good intentions behind that beautiful smile.
description.pt: A história se passa em um colégio católico, onde a doce e gentil Song Ayeon, passa seus dias de tormento sofrendo Bullyng dia após dia, até que um "anjo" Baek Yeinhwa à salva com suas "boas" intenções, mas por trás dessa bondade toda ela têm seus motivos pra salvar a pobre donzela das garras…

title.en: For You, I’ll Dress up in a Lie

altTitles.ja: 君のためにボクは嘘を着飾る

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Tame ni Boku wa Uso wo Kikazaru

description.en:
Kuroyo Yuzuru, a bit of a plain boy, is always together with his best friend from childhood, Shirotama Kotaro.
They thought they could stay together forever even after they entered middle school...
One day, something happens that changes their relationship drastically.
description.ja:
ちょっぴり地味な男子「黒曜結弦」は親友の幼馴染「白玉小太郎」といつも一緒。
中学生になってもずっと一緒にいられると思ったのに…。
ある日二人の関係を大きく変える出来事が起きる。

title.en: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Meteor Mission!

altTitles.ja: スーパードラゴンボールヒーローズ メテオミッション！

description.en:
After defeating Dark King Demigra, Goku, and his allies go to visit the Planet of the Kaio, only to find that Kaio North and co. are nowhere to be seen...
While our heroes are trying to figure out what could have happened, a mysterious new foe appears!
description.es:
Después de derrotar al Rey Oscuro Demigra, Goku y sus aliados van a visitar el Planeta Kaio, solo para descubrir que Kaio North y compañía no se ven por ninguna parte...
Mientras nuestros héroes intentan descubrir qué pudo haber sucedido, ¡aparece un nuevo enemigo misterioso!
description.ja:
冥王デミグラを倒した悟空たちは界王星を訪れるが、そこには界王ノースたちがいた。 どこにも見当たりません...
ヒーローたちが何が起こったのかを解明しようとしている間に、謎の新たな敵が現れます。

description.en: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?
A retelling of Mazinger Z mixed with ancient Greek mythology with a modern touch.

altTitles.en: You Who Can't Touch Me Anymore

description.en: In their high school days Shiraishi would tease her classmate Arashi constantly always touching his shaved head. Now, many years later, Shiraishi finds herself enthralled with a rising celebrity that she sees on TV an in magazines. This celebrity being none other that Arashi, her former classmate, now with long grown out hair. She wanders the streets hoping that by some happenstance she might once again meet him and be able to tell him the things she's kept in her heart for so many years. A tale of lost opportunities and love separated by time...
description.ja: 昔触りまくっていた坊主頭の同級生が芸能人に…

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

Xia Yuxin's presence at school never fails to draw attention. She has a mature beauty about her, always poised, and exuding confidence in class. Being admired so much by her classmates, one would think she's a well-respected senior but in truth, it might be because she's a repeat student. Xia Yuxin has more to her elegant facade.


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative official English](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/Lala/5c0a4df8d5626e75ff1f2d11)
description.pt-br:
Xia Yu Xun é uma estudante que por ter faltado em uma prova, teve que repetir um ano. Para todos os seus colegas de classe que são um ano menor que ela, Xia Yu Xun é uma Xue Jie (senpai, veterana) genial, alta, decidida, muito bela e muito “cool”. Claro que ela não pensa assim, adoraria ser mais baixa pois assim conseguiria usar roupas mais bonitas. Sua obsessão é tanta que desenha suas próprias criações, com intenção de algum dia surgir alguém com o “estilo” dos seus sonhos. Na escola acaba encontrando uma pessoa adequada para isso, mas fazer amizade com ela vai ser um pouco difícil…


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative official English](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5c0a4df8d5626e75ff1f2d11)

altTitles.ja: デュラハンちゃんは首ったけ

description.en: I'm Dullahan Itoshino. A normal girl who can take her head off. From today on I'll be a middle schooler! I hope I'll get closer to my destined one~ but sometimes my heart suddenly beats faster, I want to run away, and my body and mind feel torn apart… is this the thing called "puberty" I wonder? Heart(head) and body apart, story about puberty and love, start!

title.en: Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto

altTitles.ja: お茶目な奥さんとの日常茶番事

altTitles.en: The State of a Certain Wife

description.en:
Lee Ye-joo, a lone female college student, has a secret. A special ability to leap over time beyond the unknown door! But the uncontrolled ability is just a curse, and what she faced one day after moving for as many as a thousand years was a mad world in which the absolute red-eyed ran wild. An unidentified man who causes earthquakes and lightning by beckoning only refers to her as a "timer" and makes her his target of extermination for that reason.

In a hurry to survive and return to the past, she lies without even knowing what the meaning of "timer" is.

"Take me to the other humans and I'll tell you where to live!"

The contractual relationship tied in exchange for the reserved death, but the man's back was stronger and warmer than expected.

Is that why? She didn't plan it.

I want to melt the frozen future...

"Not only do you live, but you've also created feelings that I don't know."

An omnipotent obsession with a woman who was tied up in the future to avoid death, and a chasing romance that risked her life.

description.de:
Dawoons normales Leben wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als er in den Dungeon gerufen wird, wo er ein tödliches Spiel gegen gefährliche Monster und lebensbedrohliche Fallen spielen muss. Was die Sache schlimmer macht, ist, er ist nur ein einfacher Handwerker mit null Kampffähigkeiten. Aber nachdem Dawoon in eine Falle gerät und einen fehlerhaften Reset überlebt, hat er willkürliche und dennoch sehr hilfreiche Fähigkeiten. Zusammen mit einem blutrünstigen Gefährten und einem niedlichen Eichhörnchen muss er sich etwas einfallen lassen, um das Spiel zu gewinnen und nach Hause zurückzukehren. Welche Abenteuer erwarten ihn in den Tunneln – jetzt, wo die Regeln für ihn scheinbar nicht mehr gültig sind?

---
- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/dungeon-reset-de)
description.en: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
description.fa: ⁧⁧   وقتی که بازنشانی شروع بشه، همه چیز به حالت قبلش برای شرکت کننده های بعدی برمیگرده، چرا بازنشانی روی من کار نمیکنه؟! با یک مهارت ساده بازی برای جئونگ داوون درون دانجن شروع میشه .
description.fr:
La vie ordinaire de Dawoon bascule le jour où il se retrouve invoqué dans un monde parallère, dans lequel il va devoir jouer à un jeu mortel intitulé Dungeon Game. Il se retrouve ainsi obligé à faire face à de dangereuses créatures, ainsi qu'à de nombreux pièges mettant constamment sa vie en péril. Et comme si cette situation ne suffisait pas, il s'avère également que l'abilité dont il a été doté est totalement inutile en combat. Néanmoins, après être tombé dans un piège et avoir mystérieusement survécu, un étrange bug va lui donner de nouvelles compétences aléatoires, mais étrangement utiles. Il va devoir redoubler d'astuce pour finir le jeu et pouvoir enfin rentrer chez lui, tout en ayant à ses côtés un Assistant de jeu assoiffé de sang, et un adorable petit écureuil. Maintenant qu'il n'a plus aucune règle à suivre avec assiduité, que va-t-il se passer pour lui dans cet étrange univers ?

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/dungeon-reset-fr)
description.ja:
｢このダンジョンはリセットされます｣ 一度プレイしたダンジョンや罠は次の｢ユーザー｣のためにリセットされる。 しかしその｢リセット｣が俺には適応されない！？ 絶えずリセットされるダンジョンで唯一自由の身となった「奏多」。 その場しのぎで武装した｢バグ｣人間 定岡奏多のダンジョン開拓期が始まるーー！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/40532)
description.ko:
[던전이 리셋됩니다.]

한번 플레이한 던전이나 함정은 다음 '유저'들을 위해 '리셋'이라는 과정을 거친다.
그 '리셋'이, '나'에게는 적용되지 않는다?!


끊임없이 리셋되는 던전에서 유일하게 자유로워진 존재.
압도적인 노가다로 무장한 '버그 종자' 정다운의 던전 개척기가 시작된다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%98%EC%A0%84-%EB%A6%AC%EC%85%8B/2373)
description.ru: [Идет перезагрузка Подземелья.] Подземелье или ловушки, в которых была игра, проходят стадию перезагрузки для следующих пользователей.Может, эта «перезагрузка» применима и ко мне?! Единственное существо, которое свободно от постоянно перезапускаемой Пещеры. Вооружившись грандиозной силой, Чон Да Ун начинает освоение Подземелья!
description.th:
[ดันเจี้ยนกำลังรีเซ็ต]  
เมื่อมีการเดินสำรวจดันเจี้ยนเกิดขึ้น, กับดักทุกอย่างเริ่มทำงาน, มันก็จะเริ่มทำการรีเซ็ตตัวเองเพื่อสำหรับ "ผู้เล่น" คนต่อไป  
แต่ทว่าการรีเซ็ตเหล่านั้นดันใช้ไม่ได้กับฉัน! ฉันจะต้องอยู่อย่างไร้จุดหมายในดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้อย่างไร้กำหนด, ฉัน, จัง ดาอุน  
"เจ้าข้อผิดพลาด" ได้ได้เวลาเริ่มออกสำรวจดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้แล้ว!
description.zh-hk:
［副本即將重置。］

為提供下一批「玩家」體驗，
已通過的副本、已觸發的陷阱
都會經過名為重置的過程。
然而，那所謂的「重置」居然對「我」不管用?!

在不斷重置的副本裡，身為唯一的自由之身，
只能把苦力活做好做滿，「農起來」武裝自己，
「Bug仔」鄭多運的副本開墾記就此展開!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%89%AF%E6%9C%AC%E9%87%8D%E7%BD%AE/140)

description.en: A man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
Horny boss and underpaid salary man.

altTitles.en: わたしたちの田村くん

description.en:
Featuring:  
-Komaki Matsuzawa, a mysterious girl who obsessively and repetitively scrawls "return to her home star" on her choice-of-career form  
-Hiroka Soma, simultaneously acknowledged as the most beautiful girl in the school, and to be as cold as the Arctic "tundra" – the classic Ice Queen – at least on the surface.  
-Yukisada Tamura, a boy whose life is completely disrupted by his efforts to understand and get along with these two girls.  
  
This is the story of the pain and heartbreak and exploration of love, of an ordinary boy and two cute (but bizarre) girls, as the seasons rush by like comets.

In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en:
In a post apocalyptic world, a young girl defends herself from bandits using a penis monster contract.

---
**Notes:**
- There's an uncensored version marked as pornographic.

title.en: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta...

altTitles.en: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags...

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった...

altTitles.de: My Next Life as a Villainess: Wie überlebe ich in einem Dating-Game?

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生成女性向遊戲只有毀滅END的壞人大小姐

altTitles.zh: 转生成为了只有乙女游戏破灭Flag的邪恶大小姐

description.en: I recovered my past memories when I was hit on the head by a rock. I am Katarina Claes, the eight year old daughter of the duke. In a feverish nightmare, in which the prince’s fiancee was determined, I have realized that this is the otome game from the previous life. Also, I have turned into the villainess that interfered with the romance of the capture targets… If the heroine got a happy end, I would be exiled, while if she got a bad end, I would be killed by the capture target… I have no happy end!? Why is it only bad!? Somehow I have to avoid the destruction end, and reach old age peacefully!!

After being reincarnated to a year before her death, Bai Man's sole purpose in life is to kill the tyrannical emperor and take his place. To achieve her ultimate goal, she decides to seduce the formidable General Zhou Rong, a cold but beautiful woman. Who would have thought, however, that Zhou Rong is actually a crazy beauty?

title.en: Isekai Meikyuu no Saishinbu o Mezasou

altTitles.en: Let's Aim for the Deepest Part of the Otherworldly Labyrinth

altTitles.ru: Давай устремимся в глубины потустороннего лабиринта

altTitles.ja: 異世界迷宮の最深部を目指そう

altTitles.en: DUNGEON DIVE: Aim for the Deepest Level

altTitles.zh-hk: 以異世界迷宮最深處為目標

altTitles.zh: 以异世界迷宫最深处为目标

description.en:
Kanami, a young man that strayed into another world and suddenly awoke in a dark corridor is nearly killed by a demon and humans. Then preferring to use the status and skill systems Kanami aims for the deepest part of the Labyrinth. The skill [? ? ?] consumes his emotions, and he befriends some unusual people, but while his spirit wanes in the other world’s Labyrinth he refuses to give up on returning to his original world.  
  
"I'll absolutely save you. Hence I will–!!" Aikawa Kanami awakes in a corridor he has no recollection of, the wound he received from a goblin is cured by a pretty girl called Lastiara, and he learns that he's in a different world that's exceedingly similar to a game. Kanami makes into his weapon the hearty welcomed status and skills, and with a pretty girl Dia plunges forward towards the deepest part of the labyrinth that's rumoured to "grant any wish"–. This is a story of a boy who exposes the deepest part (truth) of the labyrinth and fulfills a wish.
description.ja:
見覚えのない回廊で目覚めた少年・相川渦波は、訳もわからぬまま魔物との戦闘に巻き込まれてしまう。謎のスキル［？？？］の暴走で命からがら難を逃れた彼は、魔物から受けた毒を不思議な少女・ラスティアラに魔法で癒してもらう…そう、まるで“ゲーム”のように。そして何とか地上に出ると、自身が現れた場所である迷宮――その最深部が『どんな望みでも叶う』と噂されていることを知り、攻略を決意する。

必ず……妹の元に戻るんだ。

title.en: Yuusha Party ni Kawaii Ko ga Ita no de, Kokuhaku Shite Mita

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーにかわいい子がいたので、告白してみた。

altTitles.en: There Was a Cute Girl in the Hero's Party, so I Tried Confessing to Her

altTitles.uk: Красуня з групи героя, якій я зізнався в коханні

altTitles.zh: 身为魔族的我想向勇者小队的可爱女孩告白

altTitles.ko: 용사 파티에 귀여운 애가 있어서, 고백해봤다

description.en: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight… The super popular love comedy fantasy set in another world!
description.uk: Юкі був реінкарнованим у іншому світі. Однак, замість того щоб реінкарнувати героєм чи королем демонів, він став підлеглим короля демонів. Одного дня група героя атакувала замок короля демонів. Годі й казати, що Юкі відбив спробу героя. Однак, з першого погляду, був зачарований красою Сесиль, клерка групи героя... Супер популярна любовна комедія в іншому світі!
description.pt-br: Youki foi reencarnado em outro mundo. Entretanto, em vez de reencarnar como o herói ou o Rei Demônio, ele foi reencarnado como um subordinado do Rei Demônio. Um dia, o grupo do Herói atacou o castelo do Rei Demônio com a intenção de derrotar o Rei Demônio. É claro que Youki conseguiu repelir sua tentativa com facilidade. Apesar disso, ele acabou se apaixonando pelo sacerdotisa Cecília, à primeira vista. A fantasia super popular de comédia romântica que acontece em outro mundo!

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……

description.en: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิสต์พันธุ์ปิศาจ

description.en: This world consists of two dimensions joined as one, like a mirror. The first is the world in which the humans live, Assiah. The other is the world of demons, Gehenna. Ordinarily, travel between the two, and indeed any kind of contact between the two, is impossible. However, the demons can pass over into this world by possessing anything that exist within it. Satan may be the king of demons, but there's one thing he doesn't have, and that's a substance in the human world which is powerful enough to contain him! For that purpose he created Rin, his son with a human woman, but will is son agree to his plans? Or will he become something else…? An exorcist?
description.fr: Ce monde se compose de deux dimensions jointes en une seule, comme un miroir. Le premier est le monde dans lequel vivent les humains, Assiah. L’autre est le monde des démons, la géhenne. Habituellement, voyager entre les deux, et même tout type de contact entre les deux, est impossible. Cependant, les démons peuvent passer dans ce monde en possédant tout ce qui existe en son sein. Satan est peut-être le roi des démons, mais il y a une chose qu’il n’a pas, et c’est une substance dans le monde humain qui est assez puissante pour le contenir ! Dans ce but, il a créé Rin, son fils avec une femme humaine, mais le fils acceptera-t-il ses plans? Ou va-t-il devenir autre chose...? Un exorciste ?
description.tr: Dünya, ayna gibi birbirine zıt iki farklı boyuttan oluşmaktaydı: İnsanların yaşadığı Assiah ve iblislerin hüküm sürdüğü Gehenna. Bu iki boyut arasında iletişim ve seyahat mümkün olmamasına rağmen iblisler, insanların ruhlarını ele geçirerek Assiah'a ulaşabiliyorlardı.İblislerin tanrısı Şeytan, kendisini barındırabilecek kadar güçlü bir insan bulamadığı için Gehenna'da sıkışıp kalmıştı. Bunu aşmak için, bir insan kadınından Okumura Rin adında bir çocuk sahibi oldu.Şeytan'ın oğlu, babasına yardım edecek mi, yoksa başka bir şeye mi dönüşecek? Bir ruh kovucuya mı?
description.uk: Дві сторони однієї монети, два виміри, які є віддзеркаленнями один одного - саме з них і складається всесвіт. Перший – це наш матеріальний світ, Ассія. Другий – це світ демонів, Геєна. За звичайних обставин ні подорож, ні який завгодно контакт між ними є неможливим. Проте демони можуть перетнути кордон, у що-небудь вселившись. Сатана - повелитель демонів і король Геєни, жодна жива душа в Ассії не здатна довго витримувати його присутність. І щоб створити сильне вмістилище, він зачав сина з людською жінкою, Ріна. Але чи погодиться Рін з його планами? Чи може все ж захоче стати кимось іншим?.. Екзорцистом?

description.en: In a crumbling and dystopian Lousiana, Rilind, a zombie, aims to help those cast out from society using a peculiar power- Magic "strings" which can heal wounds. However, his world begins to change when he makes the unlikely choice to save a vampire in distress. Rilind soon learns he's way in over his head when he learns she has a bounty on hers!

title.en: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls - Daremasu Battle Royale (Doujinshi)
Makyou Seikatsu: Gakeppuchi Boukensha ga Hikikomoru ni wa Hirosugiru

altTitles.ja: 魔境生活 〜崖っぷち冒険者が引きこもるには広すぎる〜

description.en:
After being expelled from his family home, our main character tries his hand at becoming an adventurer, only to find out that things aren't quite as they seem. Determined to change his fate, and with the money he's saved up, he heads out to purchase a plot of land in the remote, unexplored wilderness, with the intent of forging his perfect new life. Little does he know, this expanse is infamous as the 'Demonic Realm,' a treacherous territory brimming with savage plants and creatures!

But navigating the daily trials of this life-threatening wilderness may prove be a challenge. In his journey of growth, an array of inhabitants, each driven by their motives, decide to follow him, bringing vibrancy back into his life. However, unseen powers resolute in preventing the Demonic Realm from being conquered begin to surface... Will he be able to endure, triumph, and make this land his new home?
description.ja:
実家を追い出されて冒険者になるも、堕落の一途を辿る主人公の青年。このままでは駄目だと一念発起した彼は、超辺境にある土地を購入して理想の住み処を作ろうとする。しかしその土地は『魔境』と呼ばれる、凶暴な動植物がうごめく超危険地帯であった！
日々命がけのサバイバルを生き抜き、徐々に逞しくなってゆく青年。そんな彼のもとに訳アリな住人たちも集まり生活が賑やかになるが、魔境を放っておかない勢力も現れて……！？

title.en: I'm Becoming a Master of the Imperial Palace!

altTitles.vi: Ta làm lớn ở hậu cung

description.en: Wei Yi Yi is one of the most beautiful and talented women of the kingdom. After being called ugly by the Emperor, she decides to take revenge by painting him in the ugliest and most ridiculous way possible! She didn't plan for the palace's master painter to notice her and ask her to become his apprentice…

altTitles.en: To Be a Power in the Shadows!

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

altTitles.en: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!

altTitles.ru: Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир!

altTitles.th: ขอให้โชคดีมีชัยในโลกแฟนตาซี

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！

altTitles.zh: 为美好的世界献上祝福！

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.
